Package org.kj.blackjack.gameio

Interface OutputDevice

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    CommandLineOutput

    public interface OutputDevice
    Displays outputs to an implementation-dependent output source.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      void displayHand​(java.lang.String name, java.util.Collection<java.lang.Integer> hand)
      Displays the name and the corresponding hand of cards.
      void displayHandSize​(java.lang.String name, int handSize)
      Displays the name and the corresponding hand size.
      void displayIntro​(Player p1, Player p2)
      Displays an introduction with the Players' names

      Displays the result of the game

      Displays the game statistics.

      Displays an indication that the current game is over.

        Displays an introduction with the Players' names
        Parameters:

        p2 - the second player

        result - the result of the game

                 java.util.Collection<java.lang.Integer> hand)
        Displays the name and the corresponding hand of cards.
        Parameters:
        name - the name of the player
        hand - the cards in the player's hand

      • displayHandSize

        void displayHandSize​(java.lang.String name,
                     int handSize)
        Displays the name and the corresponding hand size.
        Parameters:
        name - the name of the player
        handSize - the number of cards in the player's hand

      • displayStats

        void displayStats​(int p1WinHigherSum,
                  int p1WinOppBust,
                  int p2WinHigherSum,
                  int p2WinOppBust,
                  int tieGameEqualSum,
                  int tieBothBust)
        Displays the game statistics. Shows the occurrence of each type of game result in GameResult.
        Parameters:
        p1WinHigherSum - the number of times Player 1 won due to a higher sum
        p1WinOppBust - the number of times Player 1 won due to opponent busting
        p2WinHigherSum - the number of times Player 2 won due to a higher sum
        p2WinOppBust - the number of times Player 2 won due to opponent busting
        tieGameEqualSum - the number of times the game was tied by both players having equal scores and not busting
        tieBothBust - the number of times the game was tied by both players busting
